name: Professor Watts Word Search: Pirates Life
description: Hello Professor Watts here and I need your help! I've been assembling a lecture on the life of pirates, collecting samples and documenting important research materials. Now that I have returned to my laboratory I find all of my research files has been jumbled about.
minimum_requirements: Минимальные: ОС: Win 7+ Процессор: Intel Core i5 Оперативная память: 1 GB ОЗУ Видеокарта: 1GB VRAM DirectX: Версии 9.0 Место на диске: 400 MB
